p: The validity of species determination was based on the “Systematic Catalog of Culicidae” provided by the Walter Reed Biosystematics Unit [ 16], and the abbreviations for genus follow the recommendations of Reinert [ 17]. Considering that there is no consensus concerning the internal classification of the Aedini tribe proposed by Reinert et al. [ 18], in the current revision, we decided to use the traditional classification for Aedini.
